Package net.java.jddac.jmdi.service

Provides the Service classes specified in the IEEE 1451.1 specifications and used in Java Measurement Dataflow Interface (JMDI).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CommListener The listener interface for receiving messages delivered via the communications fabric.
SubscriberCallback Entities which are to be called back by the SubscriberPort with a subscription need to implement this interface.
 

Class Summary
BasePort The BasePort base class is the root for the class hierarchy of all communication Port Objects used to send communications via the underlying communication network.
CommFabric The CommFabric class is a singleton class for remote and local communication.
LocalPublisherPort The Local Publisher Port class provides publisher-side functionality for a publish-subscribe communication model.
LocalSubscriberPort The Subscriber Port class provides objects with a mechanism for subscribing to publications.
PublisherPort The Publisher Port class provides publisher-side functionality for a publish-subscribe communication model.
Service The Service base class shall be the root for the class hierarchy of all Service Objects.
SubscriberPort Provides Entities objects with a mechanism for subscribing to publications.
 

Package net.java.jddac.jmdi.service Description

Provides the Service classes specified in the IEEE 1451.1 specifications and used in Java Measurement Dataflow Interface (JMDI). These classes provides the mechanisms for the Entities to communicate with their peers.

Package Specification
